sentences.en: Annette's performance as Eliza Doolittle in "Pygmalion" was truly memorable.
sentences.cn: 安妮特在《卖花女》中扮演的伊丽莎·杜利特尔这个角色实在令人难忘。

sentences.en: Her speech was memorable for its polemic rather than its substance.
sentences.cn: 她的演说之所以令人难忘，不是因其内容而是因其辩论方法。

sentences.en: In real-life, the band have memorable songs and a stage vigour that enthrals.
sentences.cn: 在现实生活中，这支乐队的一些歌曲令人难忘，他们的舞台魅力令人着迷。

sentences.en: It was a truly memorable experience.
sentences.cn: 这真是一次难忘的经历.

sentences.en: Like Mardi, Pierre is resoundingly unsuccessful, and curiously memorable.
sentences.cn: 和《玛地》一样, 《皮埃尔》失败得非常惨, 可是出奇地让人难以忘记.

sentences.en: Many a quadrille table was spoiled that memorable evening.
sentences.cn: 在这个令人难忘的夜晚,多少张牌桌给耽搁了.

sentences.en: Many accounts have been written of this memorable meeting.
sentences.cn: 关于这次值得纪念的会议,已有过许多记述.

sentences.en: Movie music can be made memorable because its themes are repeated throughout the film.
sentences.cn: 电影音乐要想让人记住不难，因为它的主旋律贯穿影片始终。

sentences.en: My relations with Tigler were memorable.
sentences.cn: 我和蒂格勒的关系是令人难以忘怀的.

sentences.en: She was, in her own memorable phrase,'a woman without a past '.
sentences.cn: 用她自己的令人记忆深刻的话来说, 她“历史清白 ”.

sentences.en: Since liberation all its memorable sites have been restored.
sentences.cn: 解放以来,所有值得纪念的地方都已修复了.

sentences.en: The smoothness of the flight was memorable.
sentences.cn: 这次平稳顺利的飞行令人难忘。

sentences.en: The veteran soldier has fought many memorable battles.
sentences.cn: 这个老兵参加过许多难忘的战斗.

sentences.en: This was indeed the most memorable day of my life.
sentences.cn: 这的确是我一生中最值得怀念的日子.

sentences.en: We want to make this a truly memorable day for the children.
sentences.cn: 我们想让今天成为孩子们永远难忘的日子。

words.tran_cn: 纪念品，引起回忆的东西
大事记；值得纪念的事物
纪念碑，纪念馆；纪念仪式；纪念物

trans.tran_cn: 值得纪念的，显著的，难忘的，重大的，著名的
trans.tran_en: very good, enjoyable, or unusual, and worth remembering
